alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 12:57PM MDT until April 04 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches overnight and early Tuesday morning. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph in the Eastern Magic Valley and 20 to 30 mph in the Lower Snake River Plain. * WHERE...Lower Snake River Plain-Eastern Magic Valley- Including the cities of Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley, Fort Hall, Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, and Oakley. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 9 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain
